nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 117: The Creature... The Empire... The Terror! is the one hundred seventeenth issue of the Marvel Star Wars UK series of comic books.
This issue reprints the second of two parts of the story printed in the US as Star Wars 38.

Starting with the next issue, the series would be renamed The Empire Strikes Back Weekly, but would continue the numbering used under the previous title. This was first time detailed in Star Wars Weekly 116 by a C-3PO and R2-D2 advert.
